item.title: DigitalOcean
item.description: DigitalOcean This guide will show you how to provision a Digitalocean Database Cluster using Kubeform. Examples used in this guide can be found here. Look at the Terraform configuration below: provider "digitalocean" { token = "DigitalOcean Token" } resource "digitalocean_database_cluster" "test1" { engine = "pg" name = "example-cluster" node_count" = 1 region = "nyc1" size = "db-s-1vcpu-1gb" version = "11" }‚èé This config creates a Digitalocean Database Cluster. We’ll create the exact configuration using Kubeform.
